awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 10 wins & 7 nominations.

fullplot: For the last 40 years, the photographer Sebastièo Salgado has been travelling through the continents, in the footsteps of an ever-changing humanity. He has witnessed some of the major events of our recent history; international conflicts, starvation and exodus. He is now embarking on the discovery of pristine territories, of wild fauna and flora, and of grandiose landscapes as part of a huge photographic project which is a tribute to the planet's beauty.

title: The Salt of the Earth
